data.title: VR-10 Computer Configured for a Tokheim® Full Automatic Reset
meta_keywords: VR-10 Computer Configured for a Tokheim® Full Automatic Reset
data.meta_description: PMP 18010-2, OEM VR-10, V-R #776600-001. VR-10 Computer Configured for a Tokheim® Full Automatic Reset
data.text:
VR-10 Computer configured for a Tokheim Full Automatic Reset (single lever, mechanical spring-loaded reset). This is not for use with dispensers utilizing an electric reset.

This type of computer was used in some Tokheim pumps prior to July, 1976. Prior to ordering a VR-10 with this type of reset, please positively identify the type of reset mechanism on the side of the computer to ensure that you do not want the much more common PMP #18010-5. The 18010-5 is a PMP remanufactured VR-10 for use with a Tokheim Electric Reset.

The VR-10 computer can be set to a maximum price of $9.99 per gallon. The computer is capable of registering a maximum total sale of $999.98.

Each revolution of the right hand money wheel is equal to $1.00.

For price settings of less than or equal to $5.999 per gallon, the price can be set in 1/10th cent increments.

For price settings greater than $5.999 per gallon the price can be set on in even cent increments.
